member.name: T:MatrixMath
member.summary: Contains methods for performing matrix operations.

member.name: M:MatrixMath.Shear2D(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Char,System.Double)
member.summary: Shears a 2D square matrix by a given shear factor and returns the resulting matrix.
member.param: The direction of the shear: 'x' or 'y'.
member.returns: A new matrix representing the result of the shear transformation, or a matrix containing -1 if invalid input is provided.
